text: Balo -- ''mahakasamandale o prthibite ya-kichu ache se-saba kara jan'ya?’’ Balo -- ''allah‌ra'i jan'ya.’’ Tini tamra nijera upare kartabya tha'orechena karuna. Tini abasya'i kiyamatera dinera prati tomadera jamayet karate yacchena -- kono sandeha ne'i tate. Yara nijedera antara‌tmara ksatisadhana kareche tara tabe imana anabe na.
